channel.title: 508 Help
channel.description: I have the dummies in Varrock give you experience when you click on them, but i want them to stop giving exp at level 7, and I don't know how to do this. I also want them to train Defence and Strength to level 7 without getting one of the other two skills above 7. I also want the doors to open, so that you don't teleport through them

item.title: 508 Help
item.dc:creator: @Zillionair1 Zillionair1
item.description:
@Zillionair1 wrote:

I have the dummies in Varrock give you experience when you click on them, but i want them to stop giving exp at level 7, and I don’t know how to do this. I also want them to train Defence and Strength to level 7 without getting one of the other two skills above 7. I also want the doors to open, so that you don’t teleport through them
